text: Hagi zamagra hu'za, tagu'areti huta Ra Anumzana tagri Anumzamofona koro hunteta agri agorga manisune huza nosaze. Agra kora atregeno ne'zama hankre knare'ene, ne'zama hamre knarera kora runentegeno, Agrake'za higeno ne'zamo'a kna fatgore fore nehigeta, huhampari terema hu'nea kna fatgore ne'zana nehamarone huta tamagesa nontahize.
